intro: Candidates will be competitively selected through a national search for this two-year clinical fellowship program.
Those selected will participate in the HIV Clinical Leadership program with full fellowship salary and benefits.

applicationProcess.note: Up to 4 fellows may be selected for each cohort.

missionDriven: Are committed to working with underserved and marginalized communities
Aspire to take on leadership roles in HIV primary and specialty care
Seek to advance health equity through clinical practice, education, and advocacy

boardEligibility.description: The HIV Clinical Leadership Porgram is seeking applicants who are board eligible or board certified in:

eligibility: Applicants must have completed an accredited United States medical residency program.
The fellowship does not support any international visas.
callToAction: Apply today! Please click here to access the application form

contact.name: Shanna Livermore, MPH, MCHES, FRSPH
positions: Director of Operations, HIV Clincal Leadership Program
Co-Director, Pacific AIDS Education and Training Center at USC
